hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Daily Bollinger Band Squeeze Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: When SOL/AVAX/DOGE (high-liquidity alts) experience a Bollinger Band width contraction to bottom 20th percentile followed by a break below lower band, price will revert to middle band within 3 days with >70% probability in NEUTRAL/BULL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Bollinger Band squeezes indicate compression before expansion. In neutral/bull regimes, the expansion bias is upward. Break below lower band during low volatility often traps bears. Mean reversion to the middle band provides a clear target.
entry_conditions: SOL/AVAX/DOGE selected (highest volume of the three)
Bollinger Band (20,2) width < 20th percentile historical (90-day lookback)
Price closes below lower Bollinger Band
No major token unlock or ecosystem news in next 72 hours
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If success rate < 65% across 40+ signals, or if more than 35% of losers exceed -10% (indicating breakdowns, not reversions)
